name: atomic-codec
description: Atomic-Codec is a modern, strongly typed Bedrock network codec. It delivers clean packet models, safe encode/decode paths, and high-performance serialization tailored for Bedrock protocol work, with developer-friendly tooling to keep your networking code fast, organized, and predictable.
author: Serial-V

scripts.release: turbo run build --filter=. && yarn version --patch && git push && git push --tags && yarn publish --non-interactive
scripts.release:minor: turbo run build --filter=. && yarn version --minor && git push && git push --tags && yarn publish --non-interactive
